title: [Sponsor] Copilot
content:
“This tool is seriously incredible. I have tried a bunch and don’t usually like them. Copilot is incredible. I’m actually excited to open it multiple times a day to check what’s going on” — one of many happy Copilot users.

When was the last time you were excited to open Mint or Personal Capital? We’re building something different. A tool whose only goal is to give you a bird’s-eye view of your finances, without compromising your privacy. Whether you’re interested in tracking your net worth, monthly spending, or investment returns, Copilot can do it all.

Use the code DARING to double our one-month free trial, and see for yourself why we have a 4.8 rating in the App Store. Learn more and get started.
